snippet.title: Golem Gates - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Early Access available December 7th on Steam. 

Golem Gates blends elements of real-time strategy (RTS) and card battle. 

Players collect spell cards (called Glyphs) and strategically weave them into a deck as they prepare for battle. Battles are fast-paced and highly tactical with streamlined resource management to keep focus on the action. 

With a single player campaign and various competitive and cooperative online modes, Golem Gates is coming as a complete, one-time-purchase to PC/Steam.. 

www.golemgates.com
